comments.body:
I have replicated the problem and it is related to the "Large Card Images" setting. If you have it enabled then the back face is scaled correctly, if not then you get the partial image. Not sure why, yet.

**Owner:** lodici123
comments.author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)

comments.body:
I see - fiddling with the large card images and various card image sizes on the battlefield. (And with mouse wheel to pop-up)

If you view a Large card image with popup - then view a low res image. The top left corner of the low res card image, appears at the top left corner of where a large card image would be. Viewing it again fixes it.

However if you then view a large image after a low res image, it does the same, ie the top left corner is where the low res image would begin.
